Table I Definitions of Variables Used in School Transition Analysis - Number of Siblings Number of living siblings Family Income Total family income of members of the parents family living in the household at the time of the first interview. Includes salary, interest and dividends, social security and retirement, alimony and child support, rental income, pension and annuities, unemployment compensation, veterans benefits, public assistance and welfare, business income, farm income, educational benefits, food stamps, AFDC, and gift income (denominated in i000s of 1990 dollars).
